ransom.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an amount of money that is paid to free someone who is held as a prisoner
ransom.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The kidnappers were demanding a ransom of $250,000.
The government refused to pay the ransom.
There has still been no ransom demand.
ransom.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to pay an amount of money so that someone who is being held as a prisoner is set free
ransom.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: They were all ransomed and returned unharmed.
